titleStmt.title: A view of all the right honourable the Lord Mayors of this honorable citty of London With the personages, and also such chiefe occasions as happened in euery seuerall mayors time, as also their charitable gifts are set downe, and the places of their burials. Beginning at the first yeare of her maiesties happy raigne, and continued vnto this present yeare 1601. by W.I. of London printer.
titleStmt.author: Jaggard, William, 1569-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By William Jaggard?] for William Iaggard and Thomas Pauyer and are to be sold at his house in Cornhill, at the signe of the Cat and two Parats,

notesStmt.note: The first four words of title and the imprint date are xylographic.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
